en_US.no_voice_channel: You must be in a voice channel for the bot to join!
en_US.queue_empty: There are no more songs in the queue.
en_US.invalid_volume: Please provide a value between 1 and 100.
en_US.song_added_to_queue: 🎵 **{username}** added a song to the queue.
en_US.playlist_load_prompt_spotify: 📃 Do you want to load the entire Spotify playlist? React with ✅ for Yes or ❌ for No.
en_US.playlist_load_prompt_youtube: 📃 Do you want to load the entire YouTube playlist? React with ✅ for Yes or ❌ for No.
en_US.playlist_not_added: The playlist was not added to the queue.
en_US.playlist_timeout: ⏰ Timeout. The playlist was not added to the queue.
en_US.playlist_added_spotify: 🎵 **{username}** added a Spotify playlist to the queue.
en_US.playlist_added_youtube: 🎵 **{username}** added a YouTube playlist to the queue.
en_US.vote_prompt: Vote on what should happen next!
en_US.volume_prompt: Please provide a value between 1 and 100, e.g., {prefix}volume 50 for 50%.

en_GB.no_voice_channel: You need to be in a voice channel for the bot to join!
en_GB.queue_empty: There are no more tracks in the queue.
en_GB.invalid_volume: Please provide a value between 1 and 100.
en_GB.song_added_to_queue: 🎵 **{username}** added a track to the queue.
en_GB.playlist_load_prompt_spotify: 📃 Do you want to load the entire Spotify playlist? React with ✅ for Yes or ❌ for No.
en_GB.playlist_load_prompt_youtube: 📃 Do you want to load the entire YouTube playlist? React with ✅ for Yes or ❌ for No.
en_GB.playlist_not_added: The playlist was not added to the queue.
en_GB.playlist_timeout: ⏰ Timeout. The playlist was not added to the queue.
en_GB.playlist_added_spotify: 🎵 **{username}** added a Spotify playlist to the queue.
en_GB.playlist_added_youtube: 🎵 **{username}** added a YouTube playlist to the queue.
en_GB.vote_prompt: Vote on what should happen next!
en_GB.volume_prompt: Please provide a value between 1 and 100, e.g., {prefix}volume 50 for 50%.

de.no_voice_channel: Du musst in einem Sprachkanal sein, damit der Bot beitreten kann!
de.queue_empty: Es gibt keine weiteren Songs in der Warteschlange.
de.invalid_volume: Bitte gib einen Wert zwischen 1 und 100 an.
de.song_added_to_queue: 🎵 **{username}** hat einen Song zur Warteschlange hinzugefügt.
de.playlist_load_prompt_spotify: 📃 Möchtest du die gesamte Spotify-Playlist laden? Reagiere mit ✅ für Ja oder ❌ für Nein.
de.playlist_load_prompt_youtube: 📃 Möchtest du die gesamte YouTube-Playlist laden? Reagiere mit ✅ für Ja oder ❌ für Nein.
de.playlist_not_added: Die Playlist wurde nicht zur Warteschlange hinzugefügt.
de.playlist_timeout: ⏰ Zeitüberschreitung. Die Playlist wurde nicht zur Warteschlange hinzugefügt.
de.playlist_added_spotify: 🎵 **{username}** hat eine Spotify-Playlist zur Warteschlange hinzugefügt.
de.playlist_added_youtube: 🎵 **{username}** hat eine YouTube-Playlist zur Warteschlange hinzugefügt.
de.vote_prompt: Stimme ab, was als Nächstes passieren soll!
de.volume_prompt: Bitte gib einen Wert zwischen 1 und 100 an, z.B. {prefix}volume 50 für 50%.

it.no_voice_channel: Devi essere in un canale vocale affinché il bot possa unirsi!
it.queue_empty: Non ci sono altre canzoni in coda.
it.invalid_volume: Per favore, inserisci un valore tra 1 e 100.
it.no_song_playing: Nessuna canzone in riproduzione al momento.
it.song_added_to_queue: 🎵 **{username}** ha aggiunto una canzone alla coda.
it.playlist_load_prompt_spotify: 📃 Vuoi caricare l'intera playlist di Spotify? Reagisci con ✅ per Sì o ❌ per No.
it.playlist_load_prompt_youtube: 📃 Vuoi caricare l'intera playlist di YouTube? Reagisci con ✅ per Sì o ❌ per No.
it.playlist_not_added: La playlist non è stata aggiunta alla coda.
it.playlist_timeout: ⏰ Timeout. La playlist non è stata aggiunta alla coda.
it.playlist_added_spotify: 🎵 **{username}** ha aggiunto una playlist di Spotify alla coda.
it.playlist_added_youtube: 🎵 **{username}** ha aggiunto una playlist di YouTube alla coda.
it.vote_prompt: Vota su cosa dovrebbe succedere dopo!
it.volume_prompt: Per favore, inserisci un valore tra 1 e 100, ad esempio {prefix}volume 50 per 50%.

fr.no_voice_channel: Vous devez être dans un canal vocal pour que le bot puisse le rejoindre !
fr.playback_error: Erreur lors de la lecture de la vidéo :
fr.queue_empty: Il n'y a plus de chansons dans la file d'attente.
fr.invalid_volume: Veuillez fournir une valeur entre 1 et 100.
fr.no_song_playing: Aucune chanson n'est en cours de lecture.
fr.song_added_to_queue: 🎵 **{username}** a ajouté une chanson à la file d'attente.
fr.playlist_load_prompt_spotify: 📃 Voulez-vous charger toute la playlist Spotify ? Réagissez avec ✅ pour Oui ou ❌ pour Non.
fr.playlist_load_prompt_youtube: 📃 Voulez-vous charger toute la playlist YouTube ? Réagissez avec ✅ pour Oui ou ❌ pour Non.
fr.playlist_not_added: La playlist n'a pas été ajoutée à la file d'attente.
fr.playlist_timeout: ⏰ Délai dépassé. La playlist n'a pas été ajoutée à la file d'attente.
fr.playlist_added_spotify: 🎵 **{username}** a ajouté une playlist Spotify à la file d'attente.
fr.playlist_added_youtube: 🎵 **{username}** a ajouté une playlist YouTube à la file d'attente.
fr.vote_prompt: Votez sur ce qui devrait se passer ensuite !
fr.volume_prompt: Veuillez fournir une valeur entre 1 et 100, par exemple {prefix}volume 50 pour 50%.
